title: Compound Color Schemes

metadata.description: Learn about Compound Color Schemes with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Compound schemes (aka Split Complementary) are almost the same as complementary schemes.
Instead of using colors that are opposites, it uses colors on both sides of the opposite hue

★
+1

practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

summary: This tutorial covers Compound Color Schemes concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Compound Color Schemes effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Compound Color Schemes and how to apply it in your projects.
